title: How to Hide Text Within an Image

steps.title: Choose an image file.
steps.content: Choose an image file. For example: XXX.jpg

steps.title: Place this image in one of the drives in your computer system (running on Windows operating system only).
steps.content: Place this image in one of the drives in your computer system (running on Windows operating system only). Lets say you place it in \:D drive.

steps.title: Open command prompt.
steps.content: Open command prompt. (Press Windows+R , type 'cmd' and press 'Enter' key)

steps.title: Type following command:
steps.content: Type following command: cd.. and press 'Enter' key. Repeat this step until you left with C:\> on your command prompt window. See this image:

steps.title: Now, type D:
steps.content: Now, type D: and press 'Enter' key. See this image: Now, your command prompt is able to locate D: drive.

steps.title: Type following command very carefully:
steps.content: Type following command very carefully: echo "Type your message here" >> "XXX.jpg" and press 'Enter' key. Do mind the spaces given and braces I put in the command. See this image:

steps.title: If everything went perfect, Your text has been hidden within the image file XXX.jpg.
steps.content: If everything went perfect, Your text has been hidden within the image file XXX.jpg.

steps.title: In order to see the hidden text, Right-click 'XXX.jpg' image file and open it with 'Notepad'.
steps.content: In order to see the hidden text, Right-click 'XXX.jpg' image file and open it with 'Notepad'. You'll see something like shown in this image: This is actually your image information in encrypted form. You've nothing to do with this.

steps.title: Simply, scroll down to the end or just keep pressing 'Page dn' key.
steps.content: Simply, scroll down to the end or just keep pressing 'Page dn' key.

steps.title: Here you're!
steps.content: Here you're! You can see the text (you typed in Step 6) in simple readable form in the end. See this highlighted text in the image: You can check this is what I typed in the image shown in Step 6.

steps.title: You can also hide a file within an image file read How To Hide A File In An Image File.
steps.content: You can also hide a file within an image file read How To Hide A File In An Image File .
